Title: Anne Trister
Writer: Léa Pool (screenplay), Marcel Beaulieu (screenplay), Léa Pool (story)
Actors: Albane Guilhe, Louise Marleau, Lucie Laurier, Guy Thauvette
Plot: A Swiss Jewish artist who is grieving her father, moves to Montreal and forms a friendship with a child psychiatrist. While creating an installation in an abandoned warehouse, she confronts her past and is increasingly drawn to her friend.
